nodes.text: The Praesitlyn theater was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.
The Praesitlyn theater was located in the Outer Rim Territories, along the Rimma Trade Route. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Praesitlyn.

In the Praesitlyn theater, Republic forces were deployed from Eriadu to besiege worlds such as Xagobah and Sluis Van. As a result of this campaign, the Separatist leadership was evacuated from Utapau to Mustafar.
